title: Kate Middleton 'doing her best to patch things up' with royals and help 'struggling' Meghan Markle
text:

The Duchess of Cambridge is "doing her best" to mend the relationship between her husband, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle , a royal expert claims.

Kate is said to be trying to bring the family together after a rift between the two brothers, fuelled by their behind-the-scenes African documentary during which they spoke out about their struggles in the spotlight.

Phil Dampier says that Kate wants to end the drama for the sake of the Queen, as nobody wants to let her down.

Speaking to the Express , he said: "Behind the scenes I’m told Kate is doing her best to bring everyone together and help Meghan.

"None of them want to let the Queen down so Kate is trying to patch things up in private.

(Image: Getty Images)

"I’m told she has reached out to Meghan and spoken to her on the phone. Kate feels sorry for her and knows that Meghan is struggling."

When rumours of a rift between the couples started to form many believed it was Kate and Meghan who didn't get on, however sources have since suggested it was the men who were having difficulties.

Back in July, a royal source told People that the Duchesses are said to have become closer since Meghan welcomed baby Archie earlier this year.

(Image: AFP via Getty Images)

They said: "There is a sense of [Meghan and Kate's] relationship strengthening.

"They’re each a little more relaxed. They have more in common now."

During ITV's Harry and Meghan: An African Adventure, the Duke appeared to confirm reports that all wasn't well behind the scenes .

Harry said: “Part of this role and part of this job and this family being under the pressure that it’s under ­inevitably, you know, stuff happens.

(Image: Getty Images)

“But look, we’re brothers. We’ll always be brothers.

"We’re certainly on different paths at the moment but I will always be there for him and as I know he’ll always be there for me.

“You know, we don’t see each other as much as we, as much as we used to because we’re so busy.

"But, I love him dearly and, you know, the majority of the stuff is created out of nothing.

"Just as I said, as brothers, you know, you have good days, you have bad days.”
description: Kate Middleton reportedly feels sorry for Meghan Markle and knows that she is "struggling" following her TV documentary
